name: Your Name
description:
"It belongs to you, but other people use it more than you do." As a famous singer, you went into a bar one day, realizing that no one remembers your existence anymore. You need to find the truth through puzzles and riddles ...

Inspired by Flow My Tears, the Policeman Said by P. K. Dick.

Credit

SFX:

"Jazzy café ambience.wav" by dersinnsspace

"Faucet" by FillSoko

"faucet drip.aiff" by mwmarsh

"water-pour-03.wav" by jungle

MUSIC:

Mary's Theme by Stelvio Cipriani

Made by Ed Kim and Ingrid He.
